title: Create Notice
name: CreateNotice
description: This route allows an admin or a teacher to create a notice. Teachers can only post notices for students.

Request body.description: The description or content of the notice.
The type of the notice. Teachers can only create student notices.

Array of attachment objects, each containing:

  • createdAt (Date): Date when the attachment was added (optional, defaults to current date if not provided).
  • doctype (String): Type of the document (e.g., PDF, image).
  • filename (String): Name of the attachment file.
  • url (String): URL where the attachment is stored.
Indicates if the notice is currently active.
URL to the teacher's signature (required if posted by a teacher).

examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
{
  "title": "School Assembly",
  "description": "Mandatory attendance for all students.",
  "noticeType": "student",
  "isUrgent": true,
  "expireDate": "2024-11-30T00:00:00Z",
  "attachments": [
    {
      "createdAt": "2024-11-04T10:30:00Z",
      "doctype": "pdf",
      "filename": "assembly_schedule.pdf",
      "url": "https://example.com/assembly_schedule.pdf"
    }
  ],
  "isActive": true,
  "signatureOfTeacherUrl": "https://example.com/signature.png"
}

Error 4xx.description: Unauthorized Only admins or teachers can create notices.

title: Delete Notice
name: DeleteNotice
description: Deletes a specific notice. Only accessible by admin or the teacher who posted the notice.

Parameter.description: The ID of the notice to be deleted.

examples.title: Success-Response:

400.description: If the notice with the specified ID does not exist.

403.description: If the user is not an admin or the original posting teacher.

500.description: If an unexpected error occurs during deletion.

examples.title: Unauthorized:
NoNoticeFound:
InternalServerError:

title: Get a specific notice by ID
name: GetNotice
description:
This endpoint retrieves a specific notice by its ID. Access is restricted based on the user's role:

  • Admins can view all types of notices.
  • Teachers can view notices of type "teacher" and "general".
  • Students can view notices of type "student" and "general".

examples.title: Success Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "error": false,
  "notice": {
    "_id": "12345",
    "title": "Important Update",
    "description": "This is an important notice",
    "noticeType": "general",
    "isUrgent": true,
    "postedBy": "67890",
    "expireDate": "2024-12-31T23:59:59.999Z",
    "attachments": [],
    "isActive": true,
    "postedDate": "2024-11-04T10:00:00.000Z",
    "signatureOfTeacherUrl": ""
  }
}

Error 400.description: Reason for the failure, such as "No such Notice!".

Error 403.description: "Unauthorized" - The user does not have permission to view the requested notice.

examples.title: Error Response:

title: Update Notice
name: UpdateNotice
description: Updates an existing notice. Only the admin or the teacher who posted the notice can make changes. If the expiration date (expireDate) is modified, the associated scheduled agenda job will be rescheduled accordingly.

body.description: Type of the notice (student, teacher, or general).
The ID of the user who posted the notice.
URL of the teacher's signature if provided.

examples.title: Success Response:

400.description: Reason for the error (e.g., "No such Notice!" if the notice does not exist).

403.description: Reason for the error (e.g., "Unauthorized" if the user does not have permission to edit the notice).

500.description: Indicates if there was a server error.

Request Example:

title: Find All Notices (Admin)
name: FindAllNoticesAdmin
description: This endpoint is for admin users to retrieve all active notices, with filtering based on the user's role and notice type. It supports pagination and sorting by the upload date (postedDate).

Parameter.description: Optional parameter for admins to filter by notice type. Can be "student", "teacher", or "general".
Page number for pagination (defaults to 1 if not provided).
Number of notices per page (defaults to 10 if not provided).

Success 200.description: Total number of notices matching the filter criteria.
List of notices for the current page.
The total number of pages based on the count and skipLimit.

400.description: Unauthorized if the user is not an admin or if the request is malformed.

500.description: Error message if there is an issue with the request.

examples.title: Example Request (Admin):
Example Response:
examples.content:
{
  "error": false,
  "count": 50,
  "notices": [
    {
      "_id": "603f5f3f7c6d8b3d4c1f0a1b",
      "title": "Notice 1",
      "content": "Content of notice 1.",
      "noticeType": "teacher",
      "postedDate": "2024-11-10T10:30:00Z",
      "isActive": true
    },
    {
      "_id": "603f5f3f7c6d8b3d4c1f0a2c",
      "title": "Notice 2",
      "content": "Content of notice 2.",
      "noticeType": "teacher",
      "postedDate": "2024-11-09T08:00:00Z",
      "isActive": true
    }
  ],
  "pageNo": 1,
  "skipLimit": 10,
  "totalPages": 5
}

name: EditStudentDetails
description: Allows an admin or super admin to edit the details of an existing student.

Parameter.description: The unique identifier of the student (in URL parameters).

403.description: You do not have permission to edit student details.

404.description: Student not found.

examples.title: Response-Example:

title: Change Student Status
name: ChangeStudentStatus
description: This endpoint allows an admin to activate or deactivate a student account. The status can either be explicitly provided or toggled automatically.

Header.description: Admin's valid JWT token in the format Bearer <token>.

Parameter.description: The unique ID of the student whose status is to be changed.

body.description: Optional. If provided, the student's status will be set to the specified value (true for active, false for inactive).

examples.title: Example Usage in Postman:
examples.content:
1. **Explicitly Activate a Student:**
   - **Method**: PUT
   - **URL**: https://schoolmanagement-zn7n.onrender.com/admin/student/change-status/671b78eb95c2172188f84ac4
   - **Headers**:
     - `Authorization`: Bearer <token>
     - `Content-Type`: application/json
   - **Body (raw JSON)**:
     ```json
     {
       "isActive": true
     }
     ```

2. **Toggle the Student's Current Status:**
   - **Method**: PATCH
   - **URL**: https://schoolmanagement-zn7n.onrender.com/admin/student/change-status/671b78eb95c2172188f84ac4
   - **Headers**:
     - `Authorization`: Bearer <token>
     - `Content-Type`: application/json
   - **Body**: Leave empty.

Success 200.description: Indicates whether the request was successful (false for success).

examples.title: Success Response:

404.description: The student with the specified ID does not exist.

500.description: There was a server error while processing the request.

examples.title: Unauthorized Response:
Not Found Response:
Server Error Response:

title: Create New Student (Admin)
name: CreateStudent
description: This endpoint allows an admin to create a new student record in the system. The admin is responsible for providing all required student details including personal information, class details, and optional fields like roll number and join date. The system also auto-generates the username and password for the student.

Parameter.description: Guardian details (father's and mother's names and occupations).
The year in which the student was admitted.
Date of birth of the student (in YYYY-MM-DD format).
The name of the class the student is assigned to.
The section the student is assigned to.
The academic year for which the student is enrolled, e.g., "2024-2025".
Roll number of the student (optional, but required if autoAssignRoll=false).

400.description: Unauthorized If the user is not an admin or if the request is malformed.

404.description: Class not found! If the class with the given name, section, and academic year is not found.

500.description: Error message if there is an issue with the request.

examples.title: Example Request:
examples.content:
{
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Doe",
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "gender": "Male",
  "guardian": {
    "fathersName": "Robert Doe",
    "fathersOccupation": "Engineer",
    "mothersName": "Jane Doe",
    "mothersOccupation": "Teacher"
  },
  "phone": "1234567890",
  "admissionYear": "2024",
  "dob": "2005-06-15",
  "classname": "10th",
  "section": "A",
  "currentAcademicYear": "2024-2025",
  "signature": "signature_image_data",
  "profileImage": "profile_image_url",
  "address": {
    "locality": "Downtown",
    "city": "Sample City",
    "state": "Sample State",
    "pin": "123456",
    "country": "Sample Country"
  }
}

title: Bulk Create Teachers
name: BulkCreateTeachers
description: Creates multiple teacher records from a CSV file. The request requires a CSV file with each row containing teacher details.

Parameter.description: CSV file containing teacher data. Required fields: firstName, lastName, gender, phone. Optional fields include email, dob, joinDate, profileImage, signature, bankDetails, address, schoolId, and subject.

Success 200.description: Success message showing the count of created teachers.
Indicates if the teacher creation was successful (false).

title: Delete Teacher
name: DeleteTeacher
description: Allows an admin to delete a teacher from their assigned school, and a superadmin to delete any teacher. For superadmins, an optional schoolId can be provided to ensure the teacher belongs to a specific school.

Parameter.description: The ID of the teacher to delete.
(SuperAdmin only) Optional ID of the school to which the teacher must belong for deletion.

Success 200.description: Indicates if there was an error (false if successful).

examples.title: Success Response (Admin or SuperAdmin):

Error 400.description: Reason for the error, e.g., "Teacher not found" or "You do not have permission to delete this teacher."

Error 403.description: Message indicating unauthorized action, e.g., "This teacher does not belong to the specified school."

Error 500.description: Indicates if there was an internal server error.

examples.title: Teacher Not Found (Error 400):

title: Find Teachers

Parameter.description: Optional search text to filter teachers by firstName, lastName, email,gender phone.
page number (start with 1) send within the params
number of data send within the params
